Reviews.Title: great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: note that i have only had the phone for three days.i dont understand why there are so many bad reviews, the phone is GREAT!!!!okay guys, youre paying less than 100 bucks for the phone, you cant set your standards too high. But this phone is actually pretty amazing. I really have fallen in love with it. its very responsive and quick to the touch. The box includes, phone, flip over case (nice quality), two batteries, standard headphones,screen cover, usb charger with base. the cord to the charger isnt long at all, so you might want to by a longer one, just for convenience. Its a standard android charger, you'll have no issue finding a nice one for a cheap price. the speakers on this phone are AMAZING. very loud and clear. the phone looks exactly like a galaxy s4, most clones have a yellowish tint to the flash located under the camera. however the flash on this phone is clear, giving it a realistic look. im going to go ahead and say, if you are trying to buy a $100.00 phone, this is it! this is coming for someone who has had many phones. from  iphones to windows to androids. this is a real favorite of mine. now i just have to wait and see how long this phone will last.

Reviews.Title: Beware - Chinese Surveillance Software PreInstalled Infected ALL of my devices......BEWARE...
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Rarely do I rate anything I purchase on Amazon with a one star but I had to let the public know, THIS PHONE IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS...most of us have a paranoid voice inside our heads that warns us about our network security now and then, well that voice starts speaking very loud with this one.PROS1.  It looks like a google android phone and its cheap, that's it!CONSWhat the phone aka PORTABLE CHINESE SURVEILLANCE VIRUS PHONE comes with.1.  The phone looks like a Google phone on first glance, buts its far from it.  The phone comes in Chinese Language and most applications you can get in the United States are BLOCKED on this phone.2.  The phone is not recognized by the usb port when you plug it in your computer, but your computer will never forget this phone, the software on this phone takes over in the BACKGROUND.3.  If you plug an SD card into this phone and take it out and plug the same sd card in a real Samsung Galaxy S III, verizon(your phone carrier) doesn't even recognize what kind of phone you have anymore.4.  The phone has a factory reset button, but DOESN'T I REPEAT DOES NOT RESET THE PHONE.  The phone keeps all the information you put on it, including passwords, etc...5.  The phone says it is an S4 on it with HD video, has neither and if you try watching a movie on the phone you see your reflection the entire time.6.  This phone is worth at most $5 to $15 dollars, $90 dollars is too much to pay for this phone.7.  Having to replace other hardware and software that this phone comes in contact with costs far more than the savings on this phone.My Opinion, coming from someone that studied Computer Science:THIS PHONE CARRIES WHAT I BELIEVE TO BE CHINESE SURVEILLANCE CODE THAT CAN MOVE TO YOUR OTHER DEVICES...BEWARE....I really don't think the seller should be allowed to sell this on Amazon.The phone carries a virus and takes over anything it comes in contact with, that includes:  Bluetooth, Wifi, USB connections.  If you bought this phone think about getting new everything, now.

Reviews.Title: Please read before you purchase
Reviews.Author: mrz.L
Reviews.Content: After reading the positive and negative reviews I decided to go ahead and purchase this phone and received it march 19, 2014... The phone looks great and that is the only positive thing to say about it. It comes with 2 batteries which are worthless. I was constantly charging a phone that I could barely use. apps will load but with not open. you only receive a small amount of internal storage so you really cant download anything unless u have a sd card. after a 30 min conversation this phone would run hot and shut off even though the phone was completely charged. internet Is slow even if you have wifi connected which also drains your battery after 10 mins. It takes forever to even text message. You have a front and back camera...It would be nice if they both weren't crappy...pictures come out looking horrible..I have called several times to speak with customer service which is like talking to a brick wall.they are in hong kong so you cant understand them and they pretend to not understand you. The lady actually had the nerve to tell me maybe I didn't know how to operate the phone correctly even though I explained to her lost i  my Samsung galaxy note 2 and chose to replace it with this phone. I didn't want to seem like a douchebag and keep asking to  return it and ask for a refund so I told myself I would keep it and deal with it since I made a bad judgment and bought the phone even after reading the bad reviews...well not a surprise it decided to stop working yesterday(april 14th 2014). it started ringing and when I looked at it the screen was black .so now I have a phone that I literally didn't even have for a month that I can only receive phone calls because the screen is black. This is the worst experience I have ever had with a cellphone. If someone would give me this phone for free  I wouldn't even take it.

Also even though it says it's compatable with AT&T;, there are some things offered by AT&T; such as Apps, that will not work on this phone. And AT&T; reps could not do the set up completely since it's a foreign phone. You won't get a very friendly response at your local AT&T; store when you take it in because they don't want to deal with phones that are not theirs. And forget sending back! Returning this phone to China costs over $40! Now I'm stuck with a phone that mostly works with AT&T; and cannot find a case for it! Oh and the camera is terrible! Just stay away from Foreign phones.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Phone but not very Fast or App Friendly
Reviews.Author: Neal Kinney
Reviews.Content: I can't really complain because I knew what I was getting into by reading the other reviews of this phone. I was just surprised at how limiting the processor speed and memory capacity actually was. As a phone with a few simple apps, it will probably work nicely. If you can get a larger app from the Play Store to download in the limited space (even with a 4GB SD card installed) you will, depending upon the game, not really be able to engage if fully because of the slowness. (read 'crashes a lot'.)  On the positive side, this phone, with it's two sim card slots, is quite beautiful. Looks just like a Galaxy s4.  A very nice finish. Photos are fair to poor (use lots of light and forget the flash). Can you use it as a phone. Yes, with reservations. I did not put a sim card into it. Instead I used the Groove IP App that takes advantage Google Voice and made several free calls over the internet. Because Google will soon be discontinuing this service, I tried another App that also lets me use the internet but through my Ooma telephone service. This also worked nicely. Both apps let you use your contact list from Google to dial out. The downside of this for me is that incoming calls go either to Google Voice or to my home phone on Ooma. The best way to use this device as a phone is to purchase and use a sim card, provided the company you choose will let you connect at the 2G speed that this phone is limited too.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointing.  Did not meet expectations at all.
Reviews.Author: Charles Foundyller "James"
Reviews.Content: It's hard to know where to begin.  It's slow - very slow -- much slower than the W007 Android 4.0.3 Unlocked Quad band Dual Sim I purchased from Amazon about six months ago.  It crashes a lot.  It does not pick up WiFi in places that my older phones has no trouble. It's ability to connect to towers is also significantly less than the W007 that I was looking to replace.Then you have Chinese social media apps and other non-Android certified apps you can't get rid of without messing with the root. Once I found this out, I left it alone.  The browser crashes on many newspaper sites.  The camera is, well, useless.  Blurry images, does not adjust to lighting at all well, very basic camera functions in the software.  Sometimes it does not want to unlock when you swipe the screen.  I wish I could say something nice about it to make this review balanced.  OK, it was delivered very quickly, and it comes with nice hard case.  I've gone back to my W007, and feel it's an upgrade.  Caveat emptor!

I was looking to replace my old Galaxy which I mainly used to play games like Candy Crush and Plague.  I love the way that the phone looks and it came with an extra battery.  The camera and camcorder work great for me but I have seen that a lot of people have had a problem with those features.  I was able to download Plague but it doesn't actually open up for gameplay.  I tried to download Candy Crush but the phone said that I didn't have enough space.  Bear in mind at that time I only had one other app installed and I had a 16 GB memory card in the phone.  I haven't had a problem with dropped calls but some people have.  I suppose that this could be a great pay as you go phone and camera.

The pros of this phone are that it comes with 2 backs and 2 batteries! Never got that with any other phone. Also one more drawback, the directions are very small and hard to read and I never have trouble reading any directions. I gave it 3 stars for the picture quality but the camera is not so good. The picture are very fuzzy looking. I have not been able to make calls or text yet so I'll update once I get a sim card. It does hook up to wifi and didn't have any trouble surfing the net.

This phone is SO horrible that I had to tell somebody. Typically if I buy something online and it's not what I want, I give it away or sell it to someone. The quality of the phone isn't good enough to do either. The only thing you can do on this phone is LITERALLY make/take calls, Send/recieve text messages, recieve pic messages (because you definitely can't send them). 2G dosesn't work at all. The only way that you can use any social networking apps is if you're around some wi-fi and even then all you can do is browse y our news feed. The phone wont let you interact with the app at all. Something as simple as "liking" a picture on Instagram isn't processed by this phone. Trying to access the web browser when wifi is around is impossible as well. There's never a connection to the internet. This is the worst purchase that I've EVER made. Hands down. You guys don't know me from a hole in the ground but heed my warning! Like I said, I never take the time to do these customer reviews but this time, it was a must.

It is very difficult to make calls since the recipient  says it comes across as very chopped and broken up. Does not matter which SIM card or network is used or where you call from. Have tried it both here in US and in Germany. It is truly hopeless and useless..I have thought about putting up it for auction on one of the sites  but do not want to risk my good ratings.Was going to donate it to a domestic violence shelter but am worried that it would come across as chopped and fragmented in an emergency call situation..I purchased a dual SIM card LG phone through Amazon for around $25 and it is a power house. The reception and quality of the calls can not be beat.  If all you want to do is make calls that is your phone.Goes to show multi feature or high tech is not necessarily better.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!!
Reviews.Author: Heather Cox
Reviews.Content: Terrible. The phone Looks Great but Thats the only good thing about it. The phone and the Internet are really really slow. Also the battery life is rediculous. They must have known how bad the batteries were since they sent two. I wish i had never bought this phone. So If you dont want to waste your money, then do not Buy this phone. Its not worth it.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: WHEN I GOT THIS MERCHANDICE IT WAS DEFFECTIVE, WOULDNT ACCEPT MY SIM CARD AND IT CLEARLY SAYS "UNLOCKED FOR MANY COMPANIES" ITS IN YOUR BEST INTEREST NOT TO BUY THIS PHONE. ITS A GENERIC PIECE OF CRAP. THE PHONE CAMERA SUCKSS!!! THE PHONE AS A WHOLE IS PLASTIC. I RETURNED THIS PHONE THE DAY I GOT IT. BE SMART DONT BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY
Reviews.Author: Demetria Allen
Reviews.Content: This product is horrible. I had to wait almost 3 wks to get this phone for one because it came from China. Wen I recieved the fone it wouldn't cut on, the charger didn't work or anything. The fone has a nice look an is a nice size but I dnt recommend anybody to waste their money.
